summary: I don't know how to describe how happy I am because of MCU deciding to make Tony a father figure to Peter.
body:
I don’t know how to describe how happy I am because of MCU deciding to make Tony a father figure to Peter.

Besides of every pro of this (Tony’s being happy, getting a lot of love “feedback” from Peter, feeling genuine important for someone, having a son he wants so much etc) I am so happy we finally have so much free space to show our love to Tony.

Thanks for Peter’s existance we have SO MUCH CONTENT. While Stucky stans had their content for a while (since Winter Soldier movie tbh), we FINALLY can rejoy as well, because of Peter showing Tony’s haters how stupid and blind they are. He reminded everyone how good, kind, generous and caring Tony is, how deep is his love for everyone and how no one really give this love back - except for Peter (also Pepper and Happy). Their interactions finally highlighted every important thing about Tony from previous movies - from Iron Man and Avengers to Age of Ultron and Civil War. Our little babyboy made it so obvious that Tony is the greatest man who ever walk the earth and now no one call tell otherwise.

While everyone (both characters and antis) want to see a villain in him, Peter just points out Tony and shows us the true and only hero. And the best thing? Everyone knows that is true, they just too stubborn to admit it.

And now we have Tom Holland being obsessed with RDJ and Peter Parker loving Tony Stark from bottom of his heart. And both of them are giving us so much content and so much space. They made showing our love to Tony so easy, like the old times. Of course we are with Tony no matter what, but it’s good to be encouraged to do so. And that’s what they do.

I don’t know how to describe how happy I am because of MCU deciding to make Tony a father figure to Peter.

Besides of every pro of this (Tony’s being happy, getting a lot of love “feedback” from Peter, feeling genuine important for someone, having a son he wants so much etc) I am so happy we finally have so much free space to show our love to Tony.

Thanks for Peter’s existance we have SO MUCH CONTENT. While Stucky stans had their content for a while (since Winter Soldier movie tbh), we FINALLY can rejoy as well, because of Peter showing Tony’s haters how stupid and blind they are. He reminded everyone how good, kind, generous and caring Tony is, how deep is his love for everyone and how no one really give this love back - except for Peter (also Pepper and Happy). Their interactions finally highlighted every important thing about Tony from previous movies - from Iron Man and Avengers to Age of Ultron and Civil War. title: It's Quiet Uptown
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2M4OGyA

by CassieWritesDestiel

There are moments that the words don’t reach,
There is suffering too terrible to name,
You hold your child as tight as you can
And push away the unimaginable.

Peter died in Tony’s arms…

title: We’re With You - Tony II
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Np3JI9

by mrs_t2019

“M-M-May,” he sobbed, trying to look over Tony’s shoulder. Steve blocked his view.

Peter tried to scramble past them, ripping himself out of Tony’s hold, but Steve caught him and held him tightly to his chest.

“It’s okay, Pete. I fixed everything. She’s…She’s safe, too,” he told the boy.
“Let’s get outta here,” Tony said.

Words: 2020, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 5 of We’re With You

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Steve Rogers
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Steve Rogers, Peter Parker & Natasha Romanov
  • Additional Tags: Hurt/Comfort, Creepy, Trauma, PTSD, Poor Peter Parker, Peter Parker Needs a Hug, Character Death

blog.name: all-avengers

blog.description: Writer, idiot, just a mess really. I deal in the MCU. Headcanons, fics, incorrect quotes and (maybe, if I'm feeling brave) fanart. Request if you want - imagines, oneshots, shortfics, would-includes, anything. Headcanon/quote submissions are always welcome :).

tags: i too would stalk peter parker
title: incorrect quote #4
body:
Aunt May: We should stop worrying about Peter and let him lead his own life.

Tony:

Aunt May:

Tony: Do you want to follow him, or should I?

Aunt May: Let’s both do it.

title: incorrect quote #2
body:
Tony: *teaching Thor how to use a phone* Okay, first of all, go to the app store.

Thor: *gets up*

Tony: Wait, where are you going?

Thor: You said to go to the app store. Is it far?

body: imagine tony returning home after the snap, trying to come up with a bunch of reasons and excuses to tell pepper. however she wasn’t there at the front to yell at him, nor was she in her office. tony tries calling her and sees all the missed calls, only to find her phone on the floor. he then asks friday to playback the surveillance footage, only to see pepper crumble into dust, alone and worrying frantically. now not only does he have the death of peter on his shoulders, but now the person he loved is gone too, and has nothing to return home to.
